name: Jim & Bob: Escape From Aperture
description:
This is a Portal fan game in the style of a top down roguelike (a lot of inspiration taken from The Binding of Isaac), developed by a team of two for the  Lost Relic Games - Game Jam 2022

Clear rooms by placing portals, manipulating turrets and moving the Companion Cube to the pressure plate! How you do that is up to you to discover!

Contributors:

Ludvig Burud

Sarah Abbas Jawad

Joaquin Carcedo

All assets, scripts, music, etc. have been created from scratch by us! However, the character design took heavy inspiration from The Binding of Isaac, and the game in itself is inspired by Portal and Portal 2 by Valve.

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right - Move on the X-Axis

W/S or Up/Down - Move on the Y-Axis

Move mouse to aim

Left Mouse - Shoot portal
